fixes.name: Delta Down T USD OTR Parallel
fixes.dax_expression: COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 3M], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 1Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 2Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 5Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 7Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 10Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 30Y], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ZN() to DAX COALESCE(..., 0) for each referenced calculated field and summed them. This is implemented as a calculated column because it uses only row-level calculated fields and no aggregations or parameters.
